ygData.subject: Re: Random magic duration do you like it?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/12/99 1:09:11 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... If inviso does not last for its duration (It has only lasted that long for me once) it just
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/12/99 1:09:11 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
JHoward@... writes:

> I know that all the spells that have been cast on me start to flash about
> 10-20 secs before they run out. Isn't that enough time to either run away
> from teh monsters or recast that invis?

If inviso does not last for its duration (It has only lasted that long for me
once) it just disappears no warning whatsoever. So when it randomly ends.
It just ends.

Sonoroud, 18th level Necromancer.
